long_description: Built with natural merino wool for moisture-wicking and odor resistance, the Icebreaker Aero T-Shirt features a touch of tough nylon to boost durability. Lightweight merino wool with nylon fabric offers excellent durability and a smooth surface. Fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh underarm and back panels ventilate to enhance comfort. Reflective logo; flatlock seams; machine washable. The Icebreaker Aero T-Shirt for men offers a slim fit.
short_description: Built with natural merino wool for moisture-wicking and odor resistance, the Icebreaker Aero T-Shirt features a touch of tough nylon to boost durability.
